feed.title: SAP Community - BW SAP HANA Data Warehousing
feed.subtitle: BW SAP HANA Data Warehousing Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Enable field from structure to data source 0FI_ACDOCA_10
entry.content:
Hi Team

there is requirement to add the fields to 0FI_ACDOCA_10, those fields already avaliable in the structure - FINS_ACDOCA_BW. how can we get those fields to 0FI_ACDOCA_10. Please suggest us.

 

Thanks,

Dinesh.

entry.title: HANA Calculated coulmn to derive sum of Quantity
entry.content:
Hi HANA Gurus,

Greetings.

I have a HANA Calculation View with attributes( VBELN, POSNR, Packing_Station ) Measure LFIMG(Delivered quantity). Now the requirement to create a calculated column Total Delivered Quantity (Sum of based on Packing_station value).

In this example i need to create calculated column =64+11872+4128=16062 (expected Result).

How to achive this calculation . I welcome your valuable inputs.Thanks!

entry.title: SAP DBTech JDBC: [1034]: exceed maximum number of external connections: 30000
entry.content:
We are encountering the following issue, which is causing the application to crash with an OutOfMemoryError:

2025-05-14T11:32:28.083+0000 [APP/PROC/WEB/1] STDOUT {"msg":"HikariPool-f8fa4104-4da3-4158-ac34-e9144a6bf5f5#4b96fab2-0f12-4d41-855e-049c6b52e5af - Exception during pool entry.title: Oracle space management script CRITICAL issue
entry.content: Im getting incident related retention target percentage not reached.how to fix this

entry.title: Help whit a MM02
entry.content:
I need your help in the transacction MM02. 

I don´t how change the fixes location, i try change but i can´t  because showme a error the type of wharehouse is don´t updated in this material-

 

Help me please.

entry.title: Help with tab & function (F8 & F12) not sending from DS22 to SAP.
entry.content:
I am programming a Zebra DS22 scanner with and ADF (Advanced Data Formatting) program for our receiving process. When tested in excel all programmed commands work properly however when I use the scanner in SAP Functions key (f8 / f12) don't appear to be recognized by SAP. I can also send only one tab command. IE: if I need to press tab on keyboard twice it works but when more than one tab command is sent via scanner it only works once. 

I believe this to be a communication style/type issue but I don't know what type I need or change needs to be made. 

Any insight here that could help get this project across this finish line would be hugely appreciated!

entry.title: C_BW4H_211 - SAP Certified Application Associate - Reporting, Modeling and Data Acquisition with SAP
entry.content: Which one of C_BW4H_211 and C_BW4H_214 is the most current and available certification to be taken in 2025? What are the differences, and what is the best road map to acquire/ the certification?

entry.title: How to identify the list of users using SAP bex analyzer in their laptop
entry.content:
Dear SAP Basis / BW Experts,

As per the below link,  the SAP Bex analyzer support will end by Oct 2025.

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-sap/sunset-of-bex-tools-frequently-asked-questions-and-answers-faq/ba-p/14112165

I would like to find out, the list of Users using the SAP Bex analyzer tool in their laptop. Once i get the list, I can inform the users that SAP analyzer tool will end by Oct 2025. As I am a SAP BW consultant and i am unable to get this information from the backend.

Basis / SAP BW Consultants, Could you please guide me on how to retrieve the list of users from the backend ?

Thanks.

entry.title: Request: Where-Used List for HANA Views & BEx Queries in SAC Models/Stories
entry.content: How can I generate a comprehensive Where-Used list of HANA views and BEx queries that are being utilized in existing SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) models and stories, to ensure impact analysis before making changes to the underlying data sources?

entry.title: SAP BW/4HANA Restricted KeyFigures CompositeProvider Selection(s)
entry.content:
Dear Friends & Experts,

When I create an SAP BW/4HANA Restricted Key Figure on a CompositeProvider, I have the following questions or assumptions I would like to validate:

* with multiple statements or characteristics in the selection tab, SAP BW/4HANA interprets this as an AND? For example 0CMMT_ITEM = 1000 AND 0CMMT_ITEM_0CI_TYPE = 100

* if a statement or characteristic selection contains multiple restrictions in the selection Tab SAP BW/4HANA interprets this an OR?

Thank you

Mark

entry.title: SAP BW ANALYSIS
entry.content:
Hello,

End users have saved locally Excel workbooks containing Analysis for Office (AO) reports.
Since then, the underlying BEx query has been modified (fields added/removed, filters changed, etc.).

However, when users open their files, these changes are not reflected.
We would like to update the BW query data source in the AO workbooks while preserving the existing Excel formatting.

Goal:
Ensure the updated versions of the BEx queries are applied to locally saved AO files, without breaking the layout or formatting.

entry.title: What are the SAP HCM master data CDS views in S4 / Hana
entry.content:
Hello,

I am looking to have list of all SAP HCM CDS views in S4 especially e-Rec (a recruitment process) such as Requisition, Candidate Candidacy etc.

I will appreciate if any expert can list down the technical names of the CDS views here.

Regards

entry.title: what is procedure for creating zreport .
DELETION OF DATA BASED ON SOURCE FISCAL YEAR PERIOD
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Need help in ABAP code for deleting the records based in fiscal years period in adso ZWB_FX01 (target)if the (ZWB_FX04) source contains the fiscal year period that correspoing fiscal year periods data to be deleted from the target before loading from the source.

Please help.

entry.title: Package and transport assignment after DataSource replication (BW/4HANA)
entry.content:
Hello,

when I replicate and activate a datasource in my BW-system there ist no package and no transport assignment. At the moment I do the assignment manually. Is there a way to get an automatic pop-up for the assignment like we have for all the other objects in BW-system?

I am using a BW/4HANA 2021 system and working in the SAP HANA Studio (Eclipse).

Thanks!

entry.title: Pasar identificador unico de usuario desde app móvil a app SAPUI5 embebida
entry.content:
Hola a todos,
Quisiera pedirles ayuda a quienes hayan logrado algo similar y me puedan orientar.

Tengo un desarrollo web hecho con SAPUI5 , el cual ya está listo y embebido dentro de una aplicación móvil . El flujo es el siguiente:

  • El usuario accede primero a la aplicación móvil.

  • En ese ingreso, la aplicación móvil captura la cédula del usuario (como identificador único).

  • Luego, dentro de esa misma aplicación móvil, se carga la aplicación SAPUI5 embebida.

Lo que necesito es que, al momento de ingresar a la aplicación web, esta pueda recibir esa cédula enviada desde la aplicación móvil , para que el desarrollo haga automáticamente un filtro de datos y muestre la información correspondiente al usuario.

Agradezco mucho si alguien ha realizado este tipo de integración y puede compartirme cómo lo logró o qué debo tener en cuenta.

Saludos

entry.title: HANA SDA Remote Source - Authorization
entry.content:
I have created a remote source XYZ in HANA DB. Only I can alter this remote source. I have tried to grant authorization to a role so that I can assign this role to others.

GRANT ALTER ON REMOTE SOURCE "XYZ" TO ROLE "REMOTE_SOURCE_ALTER" WITH GRANT OPTION;
I get a syntax error      "near "XYZ"."

Help!

entry.title: Calculation View slower than aDSO sceanrio
entry.content:
Hello all,

I need your help/knowledge regarding the following scenario:

Data model:
- aDSO with SD data (line items)
- Composite Provider
- Query

The query runtime is good. Now I want to test the following:
I generated the external HANA view from the aDSO mentioned above and integrated it in a new calculation view and added the view afterwards into the Composite Provider.
When I now execute the existing query, it is about 5 seconds slower than in the aDSO scenario. Is this a normal behavior?
I would have assumed that the performance would be the same.

Best regards,
Daniel

entry.title: PBQ system (900) : - The delta info package when trigging it giving me dump .
entry.content: When triggering the Delta InfoPackage, it results in an ABAP dump.

entry.title: SAP BW
entry.content: Dear All. I would like to learn SAP BW. Could someone please give some advice on how to get started? Which topics or learning materials should I begin with? I'm in a junior SAP BW administrator position and I would like to understand. Thank you in advance
